projects.title: MyEvacuate
projects.description: Cross-platform disaster-evacuation app with real-time GPS tracking, safe-zone navigation, and push/SMS alerts (Flutter + FastAPI).

projects.title: LUCAS — AI Copilot for Azure
projects.description: RAG-powered chatbot that answers from uploaded documents and Azure Data Lake using FastAPI, React/TS, OpenAI + Cohere embeddings.

projects.title: MindHaven — Mental Health Classifier
projects.description: BERT-based NLP classifier deployed with Streamlit to detect early mental-health indicators (85%+ precision).

projects.title: MalArrest — Static Malware Detection
projects.description: Machine-learning pipeline (scikit-learn/XGBoost) for binary malware classification using static analysis; 90%+ accuracy.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Personal portfolio showcasing AI/ML and full-stack projects; optimized metadata/OG for share previews.
